data.eml:eml: A new species of Uroplatus (Gekkonidae) from Ankarana National Park Madagascar, of remarkably high genetic divergence

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ratsoavina, Fanomezana M., Scherz, Mark D., Tolley, Krystal A., Raseli- Manana, Achille P., Glaw, Frank, Vences, Miguel (2019): A new species of Uroplatus (Gekkonidae) from Ankarana National Park Madagascar, of remarkably high genetic divergence. Zootaxa 4683 (1): 84-96, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4683.1.4
